changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) From concept_reference_term where `code` in ("ICD-10 S48.0","ICD-10 S48.1","ICD-10 S58.0","ICD-10 S58.1","ICD-10 S68.4","ICD-10 S68.2","ICD-10 S78.0","ICD-10 S78.1","ICD-10 S88.0","ICD-10 S88.1","ICD-10 S98.0","ICD-10 S98.3","ICD-10 T05") and retired = 0 and concept_source_id = ( select concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where name = "ICD-10" and retired =0 );

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Initial assessment","Follow-up","Discharge assessment") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "AA, Type of assessment");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Type of assessment

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Amputation at shoulder joint","Amputation at level between shoulder and elbow","Amputation at elbow level","Amputation at level between elbow and wrist","Amputation of hand at wrist level","Amputation of two or more fingers alone, complete or partial","Amputation at hip joint","Amputation between hip and knee","Amputation at knee level","Amputation at level between knee and ankle","Amputation of foot at ankle level","Amputation of other parts of foot","Amputation involving multiple body regions","Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "AA, Type of amputation");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Type of amputation

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Normal","Small or conical","Big or bulbous") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "AA, Stump shape");

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("No","Yes") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "AA, Stump deformation");

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Short","Long") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "AA, Small or conical, stump description");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Small or conical, stump description

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Right","Left","Bilateral") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "AA, Side of amputation");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("No","Yes") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "AA, Sensitivity to light touch or pressure");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("No","Yes") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "AA, Neuroma");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("No","Yes") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "AA, Does the patient have phantom pain");
